title: Teaching Sociology - The Handmaid Still in the Classroom? Using The Handmaid’s Tale in Sociology of Gender

description: Authors Barbara F. Prince discusses her article, "The Handmaid Still in the Classroom? Using The Handmaid’s Tale in Sociology of Gender," published in the July 2022 issue of Teaching Sociology.
